languages.text: "Мы с тобой влипли в самое вонючее говно вселенной. Это место не просто угрожает нашим жизням, оно потрошит душу. И я в отчаянии впервые за очень, сука, много лет". {n}Черные камни, заменявший Джай глаза, а за ними и ледяной голос идут трещинами, и сквозь эти трещина прорываются дуновения ужаса.{/n} "Ты же понимаешь, что мне насрать на поганую пирушку? Просто этот мудак с пальцами-ножницами искромсал не только мое тело, он искромсал жизнь, которую я столько времени создавала".

"We've landed in the worst-smelling shitpile in the universe. This place isn't just threatening our lives, it's gutting our souls. And for the first time in years — and I mean bloody YEARS — I've lost all hope." {n}Jae's voice is hard and her eyes are black pools of ice, but cracks are forming, and you can hear the whispers of terror that break through to the surface.{/n} "You know I don't give a shit about a bloody party, right? But that scissor-fingered creep hasn't just mutilated my body, he's mutilated the life I've spent so long building."
languages.original_text: "Мы с тобой влипли в самое вонючее говно вселенной. Это место не просто угрожает нашим жизням, оно потрошит душу. И я в отчаянии впервые за очень, сука, много лет". {n}Черные камни, заменявший Джай глаза, а за ними и ледяной голос идут трещинами, и сквозь эти трещина прорываются дуновения ужаса.{/n} "Ты же понимаешь, что мне насрать на поганую пирушку? But that scissor-fingered creep hasn't just mutilated my body, he's mutilated the life I've spent so long building."

languages.text: “我们掉进了整个宇宙最臭的粪坑。这个地方不仅威胁着我们的生命，还在撕扯着我们的灵魂。这么多年来，我是说，狗日的这么多年来，我这还是第一次彻底失去了所有希望。”{n}婕伊声音无比冷硬，她的双眼宛如黑色的水潭。在她看似坚韧的表面之下，你听到惊恐的缝隙不断扩大。{/n}“我他妈根本不在乎什么血流成河，你是知道的，对吧？可那个变态剪刀手不仅摧残了我的身体，还毁了我花了那么长时间才建立起来的人生。”
languages.original_text: "We've landed in the worst-smelling shitpile in the universe. This place isn't just threatening our lives, it's gutting our souls. And for the first time in years — and I mean bloody YEARS — I've lost all hope." {n}Jae's voice is hard and her eyes are black pools of ice, but cracks are forming, and you can hear the whispers of terror that break through to the surface.{/n} "You know I don't give a shit about a bloody party, right? But that scissor-fingered creep hasn't just mutilated my body, he's mutilated the life I've spent so long building."

traits.locale_text: “我们掉进了整个宇宙最臭的粪坑。这个地方不仅威胁着我们的生命，还在撕扯着我们的灵魂。这么多年来，我是说，狗日的这么多年来，我这还是第一次彻底失去了所有希望。”{n}婕伊声音无比冷硬，她的双眼宛如黑色的水潭。在她看似坚韧的表面之下，你听到惊恐的缝隙不断扩大。{/n}“我他妈根本不在乎什么血流成河，你是知道的，对吧？可那个变态剪刀手不仅摧残了我的身体，还毁了我花了那么长时间才建立起来的人生。”
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: 「アタシらは、宇宙一臭い糞の山に降り立ったんだ。この場所は私たちの生命を脅かすだけでなく、アタシたちの魂を抉り出している。ここ何年かで初めて…つまり、この血まみれの何年かで初めて…すべての希望を失ったよ」{n}ジェイの声は硬く、目は黒い氷の池のようだが、そこには亀裂が入りつつある。そしてあなたには、 恐怖のささやきが表面から聞こえてくるようだ。{/n}「血まみれのパーティーなんてどうでもいいってわかってる？でも、あのハサミ指の変態は、アタシの体を切り刻んだだけでなく、アタシが長い間かけて築いてきた人生を切り刻んだんだ」
languages.original_text: "We've landed in the worst-smelling shitpile in the universe. This place isn't just threatening our lives, it's gutting our souls. And for the first time in years — and I mean bloody YEARS — I've lost all hope." {n}Jae's voice is hard and her eyes are black pools of ice, but cracks are forming, and you can hear the whispers of terror that break through to the surface.{/n} "You know I don't give a shit about a bloody party, right? But that scissor-fingered creep hasn't just mutilated my body, he's mutilated the life I've spent so long building."

traits.locale_text: 「アタシらは、宇宙一臭い糞の山に降り立ったんだ。この場所は私たちの生命を脅かすだけでなく、アタシたちの魂を抉り出している。ここ何年かで初めて…つまり、この血まみれの何年かで初めて…すべての希望を失ったよ」{n}ジェイの声は硬く、目は黒い氷の池のようだが、そこには亀裂が入りつつある。そしてあなたには、 恐怖のささやきが表面から聞こえてくるようだ。{/n}「血まみれのパーティーなんてどうでもいいってわかってる？でも、あのハサミ指の変態は、アタシの体を切り刻んだだけでなく、アタシが長い間かけて築いてきた人生を切り刻んだんだ」
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: «Hemos aterrizado en la fosa séptica más hedionda del universo. Este sitio no solo supone un riesgo para nuestras vidas; también nos destroza el alma. Y por primera vez en muchos años, y recalco el MUCHOS, he perdido toda esperanza». {n}Jae habla con dureza y sus ojos son como témpanos negros, pero empiezan a abrirse grietas en ellos y puedes oír los susurros de terror que asoman a la superficie.{/n} «Sabe que me importa una mierda eso del equipo, ¿no? Pero ese tarado con tijeras por dedos no solo ha mutilado mi cuerpo, ha mutilado la vida que tanto tiempo me había costado labrarme».
languages.original_text: "We've landed in the worst-smelling shitpile in the universe. This place isn't just threatening our lives, it's gutting our souls. And for the first time in years — and I mean bloody YEARS — I've lost all hope." {n}Jae's voice is hard and her eyes are black pools of ice, but cracks are forming, and you can hear the whispers of terror that break through to the surface.{/n} "You know I don't give a shit about a bloody party, right? But that scissor-fingered creep hasn't just mutilated my body, he's mutilated the life I've spent so long building."

traits.locale_text: «Hemos aterrizado en la fosa séptica más hedionda del universo. Este sitio no solo supone un riesgo para nuestras vidas; también nos destroza el alma. Y por primera vez en muchos años, y recalco el MUCHOS, he perdido toda esperanza». {n}Jae habla con dureza y sus ojos son como témpanos negros, pero empiezan a abrirse grietas en ellos y puedes oír los susurros de terror que asoman a la superficie.{/n} «Sabe que me importa una mierda eso del equipo, ¿no? Pero ese tarado con tijeras por dedos no solo ha mutilado mi cuerpo, ha mutilado la vida que tanto tiempo me había costado labrarme».
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: « On a atterri dans le trou à rats le plus puant de l'univers. Non seulement cet endroit est une menace pour nos vies, mais en plus, il empoisonne aussi nos âmes. Et pour la première fois depuis des années, et je dis bien des ANNÉES... je n'ai plus aucun espoir. » {n}La voix de Jae est dure et ses yeux noirs et froids comme la glace, mais vous remarquez quelques fissures par lesquelles des murmures de terreur remontent à la surface.{/n} « Vous savez que j'en ai strictement rien à foutre de cette fête, pas vrai ? Mais ce salopard avec des ciseaux à la place des doigts s'est pas contenté de mutiler mon corps, il a aussi mutilé la vie que j'ai mis si longtemps à construire. »
languages.original_text: "We've landed in the worst-smelling shitpile in the universe. This place isn't just threatening our lives, it's gutting our souls. And for the first time in years — and I mean bloody YEARS — I've lost all hope." {n}Jae's voice is hard and her eyes are black pools of ice, but cracks are forming, and you can hear the whispers of terror that break through to the surface.{/n} "You know I don't give a shit about a bloody party, right? But that scissor-fingered creep hasn't just mutilated my body, he's mutilated the life I've spent so long building."

traits.locale_text: « On a atterri dans le trou à rats le plus puant de l'univers. Non seulement cet endroit est une menace pour nos vies, mais en plus, il empoisonne aussi nos âmes. Et pour la première fois depuis des années, et je dis bien des ANNÉES... je n'ai plus aucun espoir. » {n}La voix de Jae est dure et ses yeux noirs et froids comme la glace, mais vous remarquez quelques fissures par lesquelles des murmures de terreur remontent à la surface.{/n} « Vous savez que j'en ai strictement rien à foutre de cette fête, pas vrai ? Mais ce salopard avec des ciseaux à la place des doigts s'est pas contenté de mutiler mon corps, il a aussi mutilé la vie que j'ai mis si longtemps à construire. »
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Wir sind im ekelerregendsten Drecksloch des ganzen Universums gelandet. Hier wird einem nicht nur nach dem Leben getrachtet, nein, dieser Ort greift die ganze Seele an. Und zum ersten Mal seit Jahren – wirklich seit verdammten JAHREN – habe ich alle Hoffnung verloren." {n}Jaes Stimme ist hart und ihre Augen bilden schwarze Eistümpel. Aber auf deren Oberfläche entstehen Risse und du hörst das Flüstern des Schreckens, das durch sie nach oben dringt.{/n} "Ihr wisst, dass ist mir verdammte Gruppen scheißegal sind, oder? Aber dieser Widerling mit Scherenhänden hat mir nicht bloß den Körper verstümmelt, sondern auch mein Leben, das ich mir so lange aufgebaut habe."
languages.original_text: "We've landed in the worst-smelling shitpile in the universe. This place isn't just threatening our lives, it's gutting our souls. And for the first time in years — and I mean bloody YEARS — I've lost all hope." {n}Jae's voice is hard and her eyes are black pools of ice, but cracks are forming, and you can hear the whispers of terror that break through to the surface.{/n} "You know I don't give a shit about a bloody party, right? But that scissor-fingered creep hasn't just mutilated my body, he's mutilated the life I've spent so long building."

traits.locale_text: "Wir sind im ekelerregendsten Drecksloch des ganzen Universums gelandet. Hier wird einem nicht nur nach dem Leben getrachtet, nein, dieser Ort greift die ganze Seele an. Und zum ersten Mal seit Jahren – wirklich seit verdammten JAHREN – habe ich alle Hoffnung verloren." {n}Jaes Stimme ist hart und ihre Augen bilden schwarze Eistümpel. Aber auf deren Oberfläche entstehen Risse und du hörst das Flüstern des Schreckens, das durch sie nach oben dringt.{/n} "Ihr wisst, dass ist mir verdammte Gruppen scheißegal sind, oder? Aber dieser Widerling mit Scherenhänden hat mir nicht bloß den Körper verstümmelt, sondern auch mein Leben, das ich mir so lange aufgebaut habe."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Evrendeki en iğrenç kokulu bok çukuruna indik. Bu yer; yalnızca yaşamlarımız için tehlike arz etmiyor, ruhlarımızın da içini dışına çıkarıyor. Yıllardır ilk kez ki altını çizmek istiyorum, YILLARDIR ilk kez tüm umudumu kaybettim." {n}Jae'ın sesi sert çıkıyor, gözleri buz tutmuş kara göletlere benziyor. Çatlakların oluşmasıyla yüzeye çıkan dehşetlerin fısıltılarını duyabiliyorsun.{/n} "Canına yandığımın partisinin umurumda bile olmadığını biliyorsun, değil mi? Ama o makas parmaklı ucube; sadece bedenimi perişan etmedi, çok uzun zaman inşa etmekle uğraştığım hayatımı da harap etti."
languages.original_text: "We've landed in the worst-smelling shitpile in the universe. This place isn't just threatening our lives, it's gutting our souls. And for the first time in years — and I mean bloody YEARS — I've lost all hope." {n}Jae's voice is hard and her eyes are black pools of ice, but cracks are forming, and you can hear the whispers of terror that break through to the surface.{/n} "You know I don't give a shit about a bloody party, right? But that scissor-fingered creep hasn't just mutilated my body, he's mutilated the life I've spent so long building."

traits.locale_text: "Evrendeki en kötü kokulu bok çukuruna indik. Bu yer yalnızca yaşamlarımız için tehlike arz etmiyor, ruhlarımızın da içini dışına çıkarıyor. Ve yıllardır ilk kez, altını çizmek istiyorum, YILLARDIR ilk kez, tüm umudumu kaybettim." {n}Jae'ın sesi sert ve gözleri buz tutmuş kara göletler gibi. Ancak çatlaklar oluşuyor ve yüzeye çıkan dehşetlerin fısıltılarını duyabiliyorsun.{/n} "Canına yandığımın partisi umurumda bile değil, biliyorsun, değil mi? Ama o makas parmaklı ucube sadece bedenimi perişan etmedi, çok uzun zaman inşa etmekle uğraştığım hayatımı da harap etti."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion
